mapper.insert: insert into user_info(u_email, u_pw, u_name, u_address, u_detail, u_local, u_localextra, u_postcode) values(#{u_email}, #{u_pw}, #{u_name}, #{u_address}, #{u_detail}, #{u_local}, #{u_localextra}, #{u_postcode})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_info where u_email = #{joinEmail}
select * from user_info where u_email = #{u_email} and u_pw = #{u_pw}
select u_pw from user_info where u_email = #{u_email}
select count(*) from user_info where u_email = #{u_email} and u_name = #{u_name}
